comments: group projects, long lectures, tough grading on papers, 3 major religion papers about visits, long reading s everyday. Pop quizzes and ATTENDANCE IS A MUST. NO CREDIT IF YOU DON\'T SHOW UP. She is very helpful and helps you understand other world religions and how they work and why they work that way. The non AMERICAN way. AWESOME!!!!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: Took QUANTA. She is AMAZING! She teaches with authority through her experiences of working elsewhere. Her office door is ALWAYS open! If you don\'t understand something,GO TO HER! She truly is an inspiration! I wish I could have her as my professor for EVERYTHING! If you take QUANTA, you won\'t regret it-just be ready to be open minded.

comments: What could I possibly say about Maggie Karda that doesn\'t compliment how incredibly intelligent and well-read she is? Maggie is one to educate and help truly understand at the same time; providing a simultaneous learning experience that I find irreplaceable. Maggie is a one-of-a-kind and I\'m so fortunate to have had her as a teacher.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: Maggie is a great teacher if you try. She will answer any question that you have. I suck at writing and I ended up with a 90%, an 85%, and an 80% on papers I expected to fail. Definitely recommend (:

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: Professor Karda was great. She asks alot, but it is all designed to improve you. She admits when she is wrong. I found her to be fair and most gracious. I hae learned alot in her course.

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: If you didn\'t like Maggie, then it is probably because you simply didn\'t try in the class. She is one of the most helpful teachers I have ever had and is willing to take out time from her schedule to help any of her students. She simply wants you to try and actually do her assignments. She is very sweet in my opinion and has a great sense of humor!

tag_professor: Gives good feedback (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  Tough Grader (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Respected (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: Gives college level coursework for a college level class. If you can\'t hack it, you probably shouldn\'t be in college anyway. Straightforward assignments, simple, four papers and a one-page journal each story. All easy. Great lady, but has trouble meeting her own deadlines. Average quality for a college professor overall, I think.
